About me:

I'm a front end developer from Poland. My main interresting is website development but from time to time I'm learning C++ or databases managing. Until now, I managed to create one site commercially but I have plans to do more in the future. This site is about me, so you can find my projects, links to social media or technologies that I'm using as a content creator. Be welcomed in this site, scroll down and see what you can find.
